AUTOMOBILE TRANSPORTER
Professional Summary
Dedicated, responsible Class A driver with a clean driver's license.
Self-motivated and customer-focused.Exceptional leader talented at leadership, communication, and management skills.
Excellent team player with over 20 years of experience in the military and trucking industry.Talented Mechanist Tech with more than 8 years of experience developing and executing maintenance programs.
Excellent troubleshooting skills.
Areas of expertise include mechanics, technology, and management.
Key Skills
Quality control OSHA regulatory compliance Dependable independent worker Clean D.O.T.
Good at following instructions
Solid communication skills Strong organizational skills Strong work ethic Team player Timely project completion

<JD_START>
Job Title: Rideshare Service Mechanic

Location: Denver, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position: Rideshare Service Mechanic

Location: Denver, CO

Pay: $19.75/hr

Experience: 1 year of professional working experience as a mechanic, maintenance technician, or handyman and knowledge of transportation technology is required

Education: High School Diploma or GED

Type: Full-time; Contract

Schedule: Sunday - Tuesday, 6:00am to 4:30pm (30 min lunch and 2X15 min breaks)

HireOne Staffing is seeking Rideshare Service Mechanics to join a growing and dynamic team! You will be responsible for managing all maintenance eﬀorts, including assuring the reliability and availability of bicycles and scooters, and contributing to the overall operational excellence.

Job Description:

Execute on bike & scooter mechanics and maintenanceFollow Standard Operating Procedures for bike & scooter assembly, inspection, inventory, maintenance and repairsEngage in reporting procedures to capture data on bike & scooter maintenance and service issuesProcess recycling and scrap parts of the bike & scooterAdhere to established safety procedures and guidelinesAssist in inventory management for parts, tools, and driver equipmentSafely ride and test bike/scooter for inspection purposes and only as needed to complete the required task

Position Requirements:

Valid Driver’s LicenseMust be fully vaccinatedBasic computer skills (e.g. Excel) and proficient experience with phone applicationsAbility to lift up to 50 pounds.; Ability to stoop, bend, and stand for long periods of timeAbility to be flexible to work nights and weekends as neededStrict adherence to safety standardsMust have the following prior to starting: Appropriate footwear (Vendor to provide $20 stipend)

HireOne Staffing does not just connect you with a job; we offer a Professional Mentoring & Education Program to help you be great at your job, love it, and grow.

HireOne Staffing is part of Array Corporation, the leading technology-enabled workforce solutions company whose mission is to fix how labor is bought, sold and delivered to enable universal access to the American Dream.

We are proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
